root.title: Bombogor Memorial Complex, The
root.history: There are names of Basmyl and Qarluq ethnos.
root.place: The complex is located in Shiveeny kherem district northwest from Bombogor sum of Bayankhongor aimag of Mongolia at N46º07´ - E99º31´.
root.store: A stone fence, a barrow and a stele are on site.
root.general: The memorial complex consists of a barrow (a circle of size 22-29m), a stele and a stone fence.
root.description: There are 4 horizontal lines of the inscription on top of the stele. And there are 32-34 signs carved vertically on a side of the stele.
root.size: Sizes of the stele: height 1.33; length 0.20-0.47; width 0.16-0.20 m.
root.investigation: The complex was found by expedition held by Archeology institute of Mongolian Academy of Sciences in Govi-Altai and Bayankhongor aimags. They published a picture and portrayals of 4 lines of the inscription 413 in 2004. Mongolian scientist T.Battulga 414 examined the inscription of the stele.
